caption.title: Validation of detected known and predicted novel miRNAs by PCR.
caption.p: From left to right the samples are as follows: (A) Known miRNAs 1) DNA marker, 2) miR166b, 3) miR166m, 4) miR393, 5) miR395, 6) miR156, 7) miR399. (B) Novel miRNAs (nmiR) 1) DNA marker, 2) nmiR2, 3) nmiR5, 4) nmiR6, 5) nmiR9, 6) DNA marker, 7) nmiR3, 8) nmiR4, 9) DNA marker, 10) nmiR1, 11) nmiR7, 12) DNA marker, 13) nmiR8. The DNA marker is Oâ€™range Ruler 50bp ThermoFisher with the range of 50 to 200 with 50bp increments.
